description: Number of factorizations of (n,2*n) into pairs (k,l).
comments: Pairs (k,l) must satisfy 0<k, 0<l; if k=1 then l=1. Definition of "*": (a,b)*(x,y)=(a*x,b*y); unit is (1,1).Factorization is up to ordering of pairs, thus (2,2)*(5,10) is the same as (5,10)*(2,2). Factorizations may involve an arbitrary number of pairs, (2,2)*(3,4)*(5,6)=(30,48). - _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 21 2013
links: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _Yasutoshi Kohmoto_
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 21 2013
